input.body:
@peterblazejewicz Thank you for submitting this PR!

***This is a live comment which I will keep updated.***

This PR touches some part of DefinitelyTyped infrastructure, so a DT maintainer will need to review it. This is rare — did you mean to do this?

## 1 package in this PR (and infra files)

* `twemoji` (*new!*) — [on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/twemoji), [on unpkg](https://unpkg.com/browse/twemoji@latest/)
* Infra files
  - [`notNeededPackages.json`](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/59628/files/15c10d80e670b01133ffe2d37c4ffe3d3c3f3941#diff-a275c2eae7b8f788a52327e76809026ee1bc5ea614393806c8f3cbab07202621)

## Code Reviews

This PR adds a new definition, so it needs to be reviewed by a DT maintainer before it can be merged.

You can test the changes of this PR [in the Playground](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play/?dtPR=59628&install-plugin=playground-dt-review).

## Status

 * ✅ No merge conflicts
 * ✅ Continuous integration tests have passed
 * ✅ Only a DT maintainer can approve changes when there are new packages added

All of the items on the list are green. **To merge, you need to post a comment including the string "Ready to merge"** to bring in your changes.

@peterblazejewicz: Everything looks good here. I am ready to merge this PR (at 15c10d8) on your behalf whenever you think it's ready.

If you'd like that to happen, please post a comment saying:

> Ready to merge

and I'll merge this PR almost instantly. Thanks for helping out! :heart:
